says: Marine basic first aid is ideal for fishermen abd neets Transport Canada's requirements for a first aid certification.
Participants will be required to complete 16 hours of in-class room skills demonstration spanning across 2 days.
An official Transport Canada Certificate will be mailed after completion.

Topics covered: Marine scene management, PPE, Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation (CPR) and Automated external defibrillators (AED), Heart, breathing and stroke related emergencies, Wound care, head, neck, spine injuries
